output:
Ibisobanuro: Anemia ni uko amaraso abura intungamubiri (hemoglobine) ahagije, bigatuma umubiri ubura umwuka uhagije.
Ibimenyetso: umunaniro, guzungera, umutima utera vuba, gucika intege, gucika umwuka igihe ugendeye.
Icyo wakora ubu: kurya fer/icyuma (ibishyimbo, imboga z’icyatsi, inyama zokeje bike), kunywa amazi; niba bikomeye, jya ku ivuriro upimwe (Hb).
Shaka ubufasha: niba umutwe uremereye, ururimi rwera, gucika intege bikabije, cyangwa uri utwite.

Ibisobanuro: Typhoid ni ubwandu bwa Salmonella typhi buboneka cyane aho isuku y’amazi n’imirire bitameze neza.
Ibimenyetso: umuriro uramba, kuribwa mu nda, impiswi cyangwa kwituma bigoye, gucika intege, umutwe.
Icyo wakora: jya ku ivuriro upimwe (Widal/RT), wirinde kunywa amazi atizewe, kurya ibiryo bidahiye neza. Kwivuza: imiti ya antibiotics yemewe na muganga.

Ibisobanuro: UTI ni ubwandu mu nzira y’inkari.
Ibimenyetso: kunyara kenshi, kuribwa igihe unyara, umusatsi wo mu nda wo hasi urababara, rimwe na rimwe umuriro.
Icyo wakora ubu: nywa amazi menshi; niba ufite ibinini bya ‘analgesic’ byemewe na muganga kuburibwe urabyifashisha; wirinde kunywa ibisindisha.
Shaka ubufasha: niba hari amaraso mu nkari, umuriro mwinshi, cyangwa uburibwe bukaze ku rubavu (bishobora kuba pyelonephritis).

Ibisobanuro: Malariya ituruka ku kurumwa n’imibu itwara Plasmodium.
Kwirinda: kurara mu nzitiramibu zasizwe umuti, gukingira amadirishya, gukuraho ibinogo by’amazi bihora, kwambara imyenda ifashe nijoro.
Icyo wakora igihe uketse: jya ku ivuriro upimwe vuba; ntutinde gutangira imiti yagenwe n’abaganga.

input: Umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso: ibyo kurya n’imyitozo
output:
Ibyo kurya: kugabanya umunyu (≤5g/umunsi), kugabanya amavuta asize, kongera imboga n’imbuto, fiber nyinshi.
Imyitozo: gutembera/gukina byibuze iminota 150/icyumweru, myitozo y’imitsi kabiri/iyumweru.
Icyitonderwa: gerageza kugabanya stress, gucika ku biyobyabwenge n’itabi.

Ibimenyetso: isura igoramye, kubura imbaraga ku kuboko/ukuguru kuruhande rumwe, amagambo avungana, kubura ihuriro.
Icyo wakora: **hamagara ubutabazi ako kanya**; ntutinde. Kuvurwa kare ni bwo kurinda ingaruka z’igihe kirekire.

Ibisobanuro: igisebe mu gifu cyangwa mu duce twacyo, gitera kubabuka mu nda hejuru.
Ibimenyetso: kubabuka igihe cy’ubusa cyangwa nyuma yo kurya, gusarara; rimwe na rimwe kuruka.
Icyo wakora: wirinde ibinyobwa bisembuye, ikawa nyinshi, isigarishwi; kurya duke kenshi. Shaka ubufasha: basuzume H. pylori, bishobora gukenera imiti y’igihe runaka.

Ibisobanuro: imitsi y’inkondo y’inda yariyongereye ku murongo w’umusarane.
Ibimenyetso: kubyimba, kubabara, amaraso make ku ipyiko.
Icyo wakora: fiber nyinshi, amazi menshi, kwirinda kwirekereza igihe kirekire ku musarane; amavuta yemewe ya topical by’igihe gito; kwa muganga niba bikomeye.

Ibisobanuro: amaso atukura, arira, ararya kubera allergie.
Icyo wakora: koga amaso mu mazi asukuye, kugabanya ivumbi; niba bikaze, kwa muganga bashobora gutanga antihistamine/amatone y'amaso yemewe.

Icyo wakora: koza n’amazi n’isabune, gusiga antiseptique yoroheje, gupfuka n’agapfukamunwa gasukuye; reba tetanos niba yarakingiwe. Shaka ubufasha niba igikomere kinini, kirimo umwanda mwinshi, cyangwa gisandaye cyane.

input: Gukorera mu myanya myinshi—kubabara mu ijosi n’umugongo
output:
Ibisobanuro: muscle strain/kubura ergonomie.
Icyo wakora: kumeza intugunda (stretching) buri minota 45–60, gushyiraho ‘screen’ ku murongo n’amaso, intebe ifite ishyigikira. Ibuprofen/Paracetamol niba nta contraindication.

Ibisobanuro: fluid retention/varicose; harebwa n’umuvuduko w’amaraso, umutima, cyangwa impyiko niba kirambye.
Icyo wakora: kurambura ibirenge hejuru igihe wicaye, kugenda kenshi, kwambara ‘stockings’ z’inyunganiramitsi.
Shaka ubufasha: niba kibyimbye iguru cyose, kibabaza cyane, cyishyushye (DVT ishoboka).

input: Indwara z’amenyo n’isuku yo mu kanwa
output: Iby’ingenzi: koza amenyo kabiri/umunsi n’ifu ifite floride, gukoresha ‘floss’, kugabanya isukari nyinshi, gusura umuganga w’amenyo buri mezi 6–12.

input: Kugabanura stress mu buzima bwa buri munsi
output: Tekiniki: ‘4-7-8’ breathing, mindfulness 10’, siporo yoroheje, kuruhuka bihagije (7–9h), kugabanya telefone mbere yo kuryama, kwandika ibyo utekereza.

Ibisobanuro: kwangirika kw’udufatanye dutuma kubabara, kubyimba, no gukomera mu gitondo.
Icyo wakora: ishashi ishyushye/ikonje ku gihe, imyitozo yoroheje yo gutambutsa intoki, ibinini byo koroshya uburibwe byemewe n’umuganga nibiba ngombwa.
Ibisobanuro: ishobora guterwa na TB, pneumonia ikomeye, bronchiectasis, cyangwa umwotsi mwinshi. **Shaka ivuriro ako kanya** by’umwihariko niba ari menshi cyangwa urembye.
Icyo wakora: kurya duke kenshi, kugenda buhoro, kwirinda kwiryamira ako kanya, ginger/icyayi; niba bikomeza, kwa muganga.

Ibisobanuro: kumva isi izunguruka; akenshi ni benign paroxysmal positional vertigo.
Icyo wakora: icara wicogore; nywa amazi; **shaka ivuriro** niba uhumeka nabi, uribwa mu gituza, cyangwa ufite uburibwe butumvikana mu mutwe.
Intego: kugabanya isukari/‘refined carbs’, kongera fiber na proteyine, siporo 150 min/icyumweru, kugabanya ibiro 5–7% byafasha cyane mu kwirinda diyabete y’uzaza.

Icyo wakora: planner y’uturo (trigger diary), kugabanya urumuri rwinshi, gufata amazi, imyitozo yoroheje; ibinini byo kwa muganga mu gihe byemewe. Shaka ubufasha niba ari nshya cyangwa ikomeye idasanzwe.
Koga mu mazi atari menshi ashyushye cyane, isabune yoroheje; gusiga ‘emollient’ nyuma yo kwihanagura; kwirinda parfum zikaze; kunywa amazi.
Imbeho: imyenda myinshi y’utugabane (layers), ikoti rishyushye, agasare ku mutwe; ubushyuhe: imyenda yoroshye, amazi menshi, izuba wirinda n’agapfukamunwa ku maso (sunscreen).

Ibisobanuro: dehydration, muscle fatigue, rimwe na rimwe electrolyte imbalance.
Icyo wakora: amasogisi (stretching), amazi/ORS, magnesiyumu duke ku bafite uburwayi buke (kubaza muganga).

input: Kuribwa mu gituza igihe unywa ikawa
output: Gutekereza kuri GERD/arrhythmia. Gabanya ikawa; niba gishushanya mu gituza gikomeye, kubura umwuka, **shaka ubufasha bwihuse**.
Amazi menshi, paracetamol ku buribwe/umuriro, ‘steam inhalation’ gake, kuruhuka. Antibiotics ntizakenerwa ku virusi. Jya ku ivuriro niba bikomeye/bitangira ibindi bimenyetso.

Ibimenyetso: umusatsi w’ururimi wumye, gukama, gucika intege, umwijima mu nkari.
Icyo wakora: ORS/mazi menshi; abana n’abasaza bitabweho cyane; **shaka ubufasha** niba inkari zacitse cyangwa hari gucika intege bikabije.
Hagarika inkoni n’ibikanganye mu nzira, shyiraho umucyo uhagije, ukuraho ibintu bihubika, tekerereza abana ku gazi/amashanyarazi, amabati afunze neza.

input: Kwita ku buzima bwo mu mutwe kuri urubyiruko
output: Imyitozo yoroheje, isaha yo gutandukana na social media, gusinzira bihagije, kuvugana n’ababyeyi/umujyanama, kwandika ibyiyumvo.
Agakingirizo neza, kwipimisha, kutagabana ibikoresho by’amaraso, kumenya ibimenyetso birimo ubushuhe, kwishimagura, impumuro mibi; kwa muganga hakiri kare.

input: Gufasha umuntu wahuye n’impanuka yoroheje y’imodoka
output: Banza urebe umutekano, uhagarike imodoka ahaboneye; hindukira umuvamere, umubwire kutimura umuvandimwe waba ufite uburibwe mu mutwe/ijosi; hamagara ubutabazi; ipfunyike igikomere gito.

input: Kuribwa mu rutirigongo rw’epfo nyuma yo guterura ibintu
output:
Ibisobanuro: muscle strain.
Icyo wakora: ishashi ishyushye/ikonje mu masaha 24-48, analgesic yemewe na muganga, imyitozo yoroheje yo gusubiza umutsi; wirinde gutwaza cyane mu minsi micye.

input: Kwita ku ntoki zasatuye mu icupa
output: Kwoza amazi n’isabune, gukata udufi tw’imyenda mu mpande, gupfuka neza; niba umwenge ari munini cyangwa amaraso atahagarara, jya ku ivuriro.

Ukoreshe ‘quit plan’: tegura itariki yo kureka, menya triggers, koresha inkunga y’umuryango, usimbuze imico (chewing gum), shyira intego z’igihe gito; ganira n’umuganga ku dufasha nko nikotine replacement.

input: Kwirinda indwara z’umuhaha ku bakozi bakorana ivumbi
output: Koresha mask ifite filtre (P2/N95), koresha umuyaga uhagije mu kazi, isuku y’ahakorerwa, siporo yoroheje, kwipimisha rimwe na rimwe.
RICE: Rest (uruhuke), Ice (ikonje 15–20’), Compression (agapfukamunwa), Elevation (gushyira hejuru). Niba imbabura bikomeye cyangwa idahina, jya ku ivuriro.
ORS gahoro gahoro, amazi asukuye, ifunguro ryoroshye (banane, umuceri), kwirinda amata niba atihanganirwa; shaka ivuriro niba hari amaraso/umutima muke/kunanuka vuba.
• Amazi 2L • Ifunguro rifite proteyine na fiber • intera y’iminota 10 yo kwinyeganyeza mu gitondo • imikoro ikuru 3 yanditse • guhumeka 4-7-8 iyo stress izamutse • gusinzira ku gihe.

Hygiene y’ibitotsi: gahunda imwe buri joro; wirinde ecran mu isaha ya nyuma; icyumba gituje, gikonje; ikirahure cy’amazi y’ishyushye gake; kwandika urutonde rw’iby’imbere mu mutwe kugira ngo ubirekereho; niba bikomeza, ganira n’umujyanama/muganga.

input: Guteza imbere umutekano w’amaso ku bakozi b’imashini

output.output: • Schedule y’amasaha yo kwiga 25’ + ikiruhuko 5’ (Pomodoro) • Amazi • Kugenda uhindura icara • Ibiryo bifite protein nkeya n’imyunyu ngugu.
Amazi menshi, imyenda yoroshye, gukinga izuba mu masaha 11:00–15:00, kwirinda siporo ikabije ku zuba; shaka ubufasha niba temperatur y’umubiri yazamutse cyane, umwijima mu maso, gucika intege.
Amazi menshi, siporo yoroheje, kwirinda itabi/ibisindisha, kuganira n’umuganga ku miti ishobora kugabanya ibyuya nijoro/umuriro; isuku yo mu gitsina idakabije (wirinda parfum).

Ibisobanuro: helminths zishobora gutera impiswi, kunanuka, umutwe, kuribwa mu nda.

output.input: Kwita ku gikomere cy’ikirenge ku murwayi wa diyabete
output.output: Kwoza neza buri munsi, kugenzura niba hari ibisebe, amasogisi atakanda, inkweto ziboneye; **jya ku ivuriro** kare niba habonetse igisebe. Kwirinda kwokera ku zuba utarinda ibirenge.

output.input: Uruhu ruriho udusebe duto tw’umuti wa saru (ringworm)
output.output:
Ibisobanuro: fungal infection.
Icyo wakora: isuku y’uruhu, gukoresha antifungal cream yemewe igihe cyose muganga yabwiye; wirinde gusangira ibitambaro n’abandi.

output.input: Gukingira urukingo rwa Tetanus nyuma y’igikomere
output.output: Niba urukingo rutaravugururwa mu myaka 5–10 ishize, muganga ashobora kukongerera. Kwoza igikomere neza ndetse no kujya ku ivuriro ni ingenzi.

output.input: Uruhu ruryaryatera nyuma yo gukoresha isabune nshya
output.output: Allergie/contact dermatitis. Hindura isabune; koresha emollient; niba bikomeza, kwa muganga bashobora kubaha antihistamine cyangwa corticoid topical igihe gito.

output.input: Ndumva umutwe ukunze kunsha nyuma yo gucunga mudasobwa igihe kirekire
output.output: Ibyiza: 20-20-20 rule, guhindura umwanya w’ikorosi, amazi, kumeza ijosi n’umugongo, gusubiza ecran ku murongo n’amaso; ibinini byemewe na muganga niba bikenewe.
Kurambika imico y’amasahani neza, gukinga gas, kutagira amazi amanuka hafi y’amashanyarazi, gukoresha utwambi tw’amasafuriya, ntukate ku bintu bigenda.
Isuku yo mu kanwa, amazi ashyushye gake yo koza, topical analgesic yemewe ku bana; ibiryo byoroshye; jya ku ivuriro niba bikomeye cyangwa bikomeje.
Soma ifu muri litiro 1 y’amazi asukuye; umuhe umwana buhoro buhoro, akanya gato kose; niba aruka, tegereza iminota 10 wongere utangire duke duke.

output.input: Kugabanya kotsi y’amaso ku bakoresha telefoni igihe kirekire
output.output: Ecran mu murongo n’amaso, brightness ihwanye n’ikirere, 20-20-20 rule, amavuta y’amaso yemewe niba yumye (kwibaza muganga).

Ikwiye kugira: ga zo kuboha, alcohol swabs, antiseptique, gauze na tape, scissors, ORS, paracetamol/ibuprofen y’abakuze n’iy’abana (niba byemewe), thermometer, gloves, bandaids, cream y’agakate ka moskito.
Kubona ibihu/imyambi, kuribwa mu maso rimwe na rimwe, kureba kure bigabanuka buhoro buhoro; byihutirwa gusura muganga w’amaso—glaucoma yangiza buhoro buhoro iyo itavuwe.
Kwambara seatbelt buri gihe, kudakoresha telefoni utwaye, kwirinda ibisindisha, kugenzura imiterere y’imodoka (amapine, feri), kugenda buhoro mu mvura n’ijoro.

output.input: Kwirinda ibikomoka ku mirimbo ku kuruhu kwanjye koroheje
output.output: Kwirinda parfum zikaze, nickel (amasaro atari stainless), gusiga cream z’umutuzo, kwipimisha niba bikomeza (patch test).

output.output: Icyo wakora: ishashi ishyushye, kremu y’uruhu yoroheje, kwambara gloves mu mirimo, analgesic yoroheje niba byemewe; shaka ubufasha niba habayeho kubyimba bikomeye cyangwa gupfumuka k’uruhu.
